00021 bool moreCmp( const util::istring &a, const util::istring &b ) {return a.length() > b.length();}
00022 }

00024 void FileFormat::write( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & )
00025 {
00026     std::list<std::string> names = makeUniqueFilenames( images, filename );
00027     std::list<std::string>::const_iterator inames = names.begin();
00028     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00029         std::string uniquePath = *( inames++ );
00030 
00031         try {
00032             write( ref, uniquePath, dialect );
00033             LOG( Runtime, notice )
00034                     << "Image of size " << ref.getSizeAsVector() << " written to " <<  uniquePath
00035                     << " using " <<  getName() << ( dialect.empty() ?
00036                                                     std::string() :
00037                                                     std::string( " and dialect " ) + dialect
00038                                                   );
00039         } catch ( std::runtime_error &e ) {
00040             LOG( Runtime, warning )
00041                     << "Failed to write image to " <<  uniquePath << " using " <<  getName() << " (" << e.what() << ")";
00042         }
00043     }
00044 }

00046 bool FileFormat::hasOrTell( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &name, const isis::util::PropertyMap &object, isis::LogLevel level )
00047 {
00048     if ( object.hasProperty( name ) ) {
00049         return true;
00050     } else {
00051         LOG( Runtime, level ) << "Missing property " << name;
00052         return false;
00053     }
00054 }

00066 std::list< util::istring > FileFormat::getSuffixes( io_modes mode )const
00067 {
00068     std::list<util::istring> ret = util::stringToList<util::istring>( suffixes( mode ), boost::regex( "[[:space:]]" ) );
00069     BOOST_FOREACH( util::istring & ref, ret ) {
00070         ref.erase( 0, ref.find_first_not_of( '.' ) ); // remove leading . if there are some
00071     }
00072     ret.sort( _internal::moreCmp ); //start with the longest suffix
00073     return ret;
00074 }
00075 
00076 std::pair< std::string, std::string > FileFormat::makeBasename( const std::string &filename )const
00077 {
00078     std::list<util::istring> supported_suffixes = getSuffixes();
00079     util::istring ifilename( filename.begin(), filename.end() );
00080     BOOST_FOREACH( const util::istring & suffix, supported_suffixes ) {
00081         size_t at = ifilename.rfind( suffix );
00082 
00083         if( at != ifilename.npos ) {
00084             if( at && ifilename[at - 1] == '.' )
00085                 at--;
00086 
00087             return std::make_pair( filename.substr( 0, at ), filename.substr( at ) );
00088         }
00089     }
00090     return std::make_pair( filename, std::string() );
00091 }
00092 
00093 std::string FileFormat::makeFilename( const util::PropertyMap &props, std::string namePattern )
00094 {
00095     boost::regex reg( "\\{[^{}]+\\}" );
00096     boost::regex regFormatInt( "%d_" ); // add leading zeros to int values - always as much as possible
00097     //NOTE: can also be done for rounding floats, but at the moment not required so not done right now
00098 
00099     boost::match_results<std::string::iterator> what;
00100     std::string::iterator pos = namePattern.begin();
00101 
00102 
00103     while( boost::regex_search( pos, namePattern.end() , what, reg ) ) {
00104 
00105         bool isFormatUsed = false;
00106         boost::cmatch m;
00107         size_t mSize = 1;
00108 
00109         if ( boost::regex_match( what[0].str().substr( 1, regFormatInt.size() ).c_str(), m, regFormatInt ) ) {
00110             mSize += regFormatInt.size();
00111             isFormatUsed = true;
00112         }
00113 
00114         util::PropertyMap::KeyType prop( what[0].str().substr( mSize, what.length() - 1 - mSize ).c_str() );
00115         const std::string::iterator start = what[0].first, end = what[0].second;
00116 
00117         if( props.hasProperty( prop ) ) {
00118             std::string pstring;
00119 
00120             if ( true == isFormatUsed ) {
00121                 size_t overallDigits = 0;
00122                 unsigned short tID = ( *props.propertyValue( prop ) ).getTypeID();
00123 
00124                 switch ( tID = ( *props.propertyValue( prop ) ).getTypeID() ) {
00125                 case util::Value<uint8_t>::staticID:
00126                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<uint8_t>::max() ) );
00127                     break;
00128                 case util::Value<int8_t>::staticID:
00129                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<int8_t>::max() ) );
00130                     break;
00131                 case util::Value<uint16_t>::staticID:
00132                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<uint16_t>::max() ) );
00133                     break;
00134                 case util::Value<int16_t>::staticID:
00135                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::max() ) );
00136                     break;
00137                 case util::Value<uint32_t>::staticID:
00138                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max() ) );
00139                     break;
00140                 case util::Value<int32_t>::staticID:
00141                     overallDigits = ceil( log10( std::numeric_limits<int32_t>::max() ) );
00142                     break;
00143                 default:
00144                     break;
00145                 }
00146 
00147                 pstring =  boost::regex_replace( props.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prop ), boost::regex( "[[:space:]/\\\\]" ), "_" );
00148 
00149                 if ( 0 < overallDigits ) {
00150                     size_t zerosToFill = overallDigits - pstring.length();
00151                     pstring.insert( 0, zerosToFill, '0' );
00152                 }
00153             } else {
00154                 pstring =  boost::regex_replace( props.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prop ), boost::regex( "[[:space:]/\\\\]" ), "_" );
00155             }
00156 
00157             const size_t dist = start - namePattern.begin();
00158 
00159             namePattern.replace( start, end, pstring );
00160 
00161             pos = namePattern.begin() + dist + pstring.length();
00162 
00163             LOG( Debug, info )
00164                     << "Replacing " << util::PropertyMap::KeyType( "{" ) + prop + "}" << " by "   << props.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prop )
00165                     << " the string is now " << namePattern;
00166         } else {
00167             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "The property " << util::MSubject( prop ) << " does not exist - ignoring it";
00168             namePattern.replace( start, end, "" ); // it must be removed, or it will match forever
00169         }
00170     }
00171 
00172     return namePattern;
00173 }
00174 
00175 std::list<std::string> FileFormat::makeUniqueFilenames( const std::list<data::Image> &images, const std::string &namePattern )const
00176 {
00177     std::list<std::string> ret;
00178     std::map<std::string, unsigned short> names, used_names;
00179     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00180         names[makeFilename( ref, namePattern )]++;
00181     }
00182 
00183     BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<data::Image>::const_reference ref, images ) {
00184         std::string name = makeFilename( ref, namePattern );
00185 
00186         if( names[name] > 1 ) {
00187             const unsigned short number = ++used_names[name];
00188             const unsigned short length = ( uint16_t )log10( ( float )names[name] ) - ( uint16_t )log10( ( float )number );
00189             const std::string snumber = std::string( length, '0' ) + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( number );
00190             const std::pair<std::string, std::string> splitted = makeBasename( name );
00191             name = splitted.first + "_" + snumber + splitted.second;
00192         }
00193 
00194         ret.push_back( name );
00195     }
00196     return ret;
00197 }

00199 const float FileFormat::invalid_float = -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity();
